overview: Evelina “the Menu Maven” Blanche: Evelina began her career with LocalUp as a Content Representative and was quickly promoted to Online Ordering Content Manager making her an expert on the functionality of our Online Ordering System. She manages all work flow that passes between Licensee & Restaurant that pertains to their Online Ordering menu to ensure accurate and timely completion of all requests. Evelina also plays a key role in improving our Content Department by assisting with the implementation of more automated and efficient processes to guarantee satisifcation from all our customers. Evelina attended University of Maryland Baltimore County, where she earned a B.A. in Psychology.
